description: Extension to existing extract duct from kitchen canopy. Also Parallel Listed Building Consent application Ref: P061129.
decision_conditions:
The applicant shall carry out a noise assessment following the guidelines contained in. BS 4142:1997 “Method for rating industrial noise affecting mixed residential and industrial areas”
The noise survey report and scheme of sound insulation and/or noise control measures shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing. No plant or equipment shall be installed until the submitted scheme has been approved by the Local Planning Authority, and the plant may only be installed in accordance with the sound insulation and/or noise control measures approved by the Local Planning Authority. No changes to the implemented scheme will be permitted without the prior consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: To protect the amenity of adjacent residents
